nodes.text: A member of the Abyssin species worked as a mercenary during the Great Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. An abusive individual, the mercenary was killed in 3660 BBY by an eight-year-old Mandalorian child named Akaavi Spar. The Zabrak girl used an improved flamethrower to kill the Abyssin, earning her the nickname "firehand" among her clan.
The Abyssin mercenary was first mentioned in the Codex entry for Akaavi Spar in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, but the Abyssin's gender was not specified.
